content.en: Cloud detection enhancement: Researchers are exploring how deep learning algorithms can improve cloud detection in remote sensing images. They are developing methods such as deep learning-based cloud detection, multiple convolutional neural networks for multilevel cloud detection, and cloud segmentation CNN for cloud classification. These algorithms aim to enhance cloud detection and improve the accuracy of cloud identification in satellite imagery.
content.da: Forbedring af skyregistrering: Forskere undersøger, hvordan deep learning-algoritmer kan forbedre skyregistrering i fjernmålingsbilleder. De udvikler metoder som deep learning-baseret skyregistrering, flere konvolutionelle neurale netværk til flertrins skyregistrering og cloud segmentation CNN til klassificering af skyer. Disse algoritmer sigter mod at forbedre skyregistrering og øge nøjagtigheden af skyidentifikation i satellitbilleder.
